title: E2E implementation and go-live of B2B Fiber/FTTH GGS infrastructure order cancellation coming from EOS during GIGA construction process
description:
Description
Process information:
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=MBFY&title=Architecture+Vision+PI26 
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Sequence+Diagram+FTTH+Process 
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Cancellation+Processes+FTTH
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/System+Design+GGS+Partial+Order+Cancellation 
Requirement:
The running infrastructure order can be cancelled in EOS after having been sent to GGS:
EOS will cancel an infrastructure order which is already being processed by GIGA
Prioritization by EOS in PI26 to be discussed
EOS sends cancellation order to O3 
O3 will create cancellation order
O3 cancellation order will be sent to GIGA
Planned for PI26
GIGA will process cancellation order
Already built
Link for Documentation in Wiki:
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=MBFY&title=Architecture+Vision+PI26 
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Sequence+Diagram+FTTH+Process 
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Cancellation+Processes+FTTH 
Target process O3:
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/System+Design+GGS+Partial+Order+Cancellation
